data.actual_result: It takes you back to the page where you enter your auth code
data.expected_result: Discord should prompt you that the backup code is wrong (it does this if you enter a wrong code)
data.short_description: Giving a backup code a null value will not give you an error message
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable 2FA on your discord account - Logout of discord - Click Login - Enter your credentials - Click the three dots in the top right corner - Click backup codes - Leave the box blank and click ok
